meanings.definition: Reduced in size or amount by exposure to light.
meanings.sent2: The photoreduced flowers looked smaller than usual.
meanings.sent3: The photoreduced cake was so small, it could fit in a matchbox.
meanings.sent4: Her photoreduced dreams seemed to shrink in the morning light.
meanings.sent5: The photoreduced stars sparkled faintly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: To decrease in size or amount through exposure to light.
meanings.sent1: She photoreduced the paper to fit it in the envelope.
meanings.sent2: The fabric photoreduced after being left in the sun for too long.
meanings.sent3: The cookies photoreduced in the hot oven, becoming bite-sized.
meanings.sent4: His excitement photoreduced as the day went on.
meanings.sent5: The ice cube photoreduced quickly under the warm sun.

meanings.definition: The act of decreasing in size or amount through exposure to light.
meanings.sent1: The photoreduced of the photo made it hard to see the details.
meanings.sent2: The photoreduced of the sculpture was intentional to create shadows.
meanings.sent3: The photoreduced of the balloon animals made them look like miniatures.
meanings.sent4: The photoreduced of the crowd in the distance seemed like a painting.
meanings.sent5: The photoreduced of the map made it difficult to read the street names.
